projects.name: ft_transcendence
projects.desc: Modern multiplayer pong game web application in React and NestJS. This is the latest project of the 42 common core, involving the creation of a full stack application with multiplayer online pong as its main objective. It includes many features such as a matchmaking system, statistics, game history, friendship system and real-time chat.

projects.name: react-weather-app
projects.desc: An interactive weather application created in React and Tailwind that lets you check the weather forecast in real time. I created this application to learn react.

projects.name: webserv
projects.desc: Basic HTTP server written from scratch in C++98. Created during the common core of 42, it implements POST, GET and DELETE methods and integrates CGI for dynamic pages.

projects.name: cub3d
projects.desc: A simple 3D raycasting rendering in C using the MiniLibX library. Produced during the common core of 42, this project was inspired by the world-famous Wolfenstein 3D game, which was the first FPS ever.
